restrictedtrueon_desktopfalse4a592ec9dbeab818bb5a4a281396196701970-01-03 00:00:00This form can be used to mass generate and export PDFs of all KB articles from the selected Knowledge Base.

This request creates a process which can take some time to run. Please be aware.

After submission, an email will be sent to you with a link to download a zip of all requested files.

Each article will be named KBXXXXXXX-KB_SHORT_DESCRIPTION.pdf

Note: Some KB article names may change during this process.
"\" will change to "_"
":" will change to "-"
File names are limited to 96 characters
Process limit is 1000 files
